mods.abstract: $100 Reward. RAN AWAY from the subscriber on the night of the 12th inst., ALECK, black, about five feet, heavy built, round face, teeth bad, aged between 28 and 30 years. JACK, five feet 8 or 9 inches, black or nearly so, has a scar on his face, rather heavy made, 30 or 35 years old. The above reward I will give if taken out of this Parish and delievered to me, or $50 if taken in this Parish and secured so that I can get them. JOHN McMERTY. Trenton, La., Dec. 16, 1859.
